column4: Question off topic: Has anyone replaced a heatsink on their graphics card?
Or more to the point. Has anyone pulled the heatsink off and snapped a couple of the little fuse links on the top of the GPU off?
is it bad? and will the card still work?
- ummmmm, usually fuses and connections and heatsinks etc. etc. are all there for a reason.  So, I won't say it is "good"
